game.name: Dawn of Anarchy
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Dawn of Anarchy에서 당신은 비밀 임무를 맡은 경험 많은 병사이자 전투 메크 조종사가 됩니다. 인공지능 로봇을 생산하는 공장이 통제력을 잃었습니다. 무정부 상태의 새벽에 결정적인 전투를 준비하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In Dawn of Anarchy, you become an experienced soldier and combat mech pilot tasked with a secret mission. A factory producing artificial intelligence robots has gone out of control. Prepare for the decisive battle at the dawn of anarchy.

reviewHighlights.text: MechWarrior on minimals! :) We clear the shore, run away from the guns and wet the drones, then the guns!
I played something similar on PS1. Cool shooter.
